Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO WOMEN'S ISSUES

Title: Relates to hospital care for mastectomy, lumpectomy, and lymph node dissection patients
Summary: Requires that general hospitals that provide mastectomy surgery, lymph node dissection or lumpectomy provide information to such patients concerning options for breast reconstruction.
LawCode: Amd ยง2803-o, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to hospital care for mastectomy, lumpectomy, and lymph node dissection patients
